text: Gideon said to God, “If indeed you are going to save Israel through me, as you have said,
He walled off the inner court with three courses of hewn stones and one course of cedar beams.
whose son was Bukki, whose son was Uzzi, whose son was Zerahiah,
When they sin against you (for there is no one who does not sin), and in your anger against them you deliver them to an enemy, so that their captors carry them off to another land, far or near,
These accompanied the beast wherever it was; wherever it moved, they moved too and never left it.
If you see the intelligent, seek them out; let your feet wear away their doorsteps!
nor do they restore sight to the blind, or rescue anyone in distress.
Dismiss them so that they can go to the surrounding farms and villages and buy themselves something to eat.”
Be merciful, just as [also] your Father is merciful. Judging Others.
But I told you that although you have seen [me], you do not believe.
